channel.title: Snowe - A Delta Base / Now Loading 602
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/n6x01.jpg[/img] [size=7pt]Follow the project click [url=http://snowedelta.tk]here[/url][/size][/center]
Hello I am developing a Delta based server called snowe.
Snowe will contain spirit shields, dragon claws ect. NO CUSTOMS.
Snowe will have a stable eco along with fun Pking.
Snowe will be a clean standard quality RSPS.
Source: Dannyscape
Thanks Enzo42 for making client load 602.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Green = Done / Orange = Currently working on / Red = Haven't Started
[b]Currently Finished(will be updated)[/b] *Fixed thieving stalls *Fixed Some of Emotes *Redo Client Spirts *Redo All Prices *Lower Exp Rates *Relocate Shops
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]Work to be done(more will be added)[/b] [color=orange]*Relocate Home[/color] *Custom Pk map *Gambling Game *Fix Barrows Repair man *Create Skillzone *Custom Minigame *Monthly sales on items *Elaborate Money Making *Interesting Npc Dialogue *Secret Treasure Locations *Bob Quest Line *Holiday events
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
There is a lot to be done, and I could use some help. Before you get one thing straight for this server there is no owner, just developers, hosts, administrators, moderators. Because its about the work you do not the work you don't. I am simply a founder/developer not an owner. I prefer this way of thinking so there is no power struggle of who owns what. So hopefully a better staff system can be created from this example.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]Open Spots[/b] Developer: [i]2/2[/i] Hoster: [i]0/1[/i] Advertiser(no spamming other servers): [i]0/4[/i] Beta Tester: [i]3/5[/i] Suggestion Giver: [i]0/3[/i]
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]Application(^Must have)[/b] Name: Age: ^Skype: Spot: Experience: Country(timezone purposes):
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]How to Contact me[/b] Skype: TexizGFX Email: Texizgfx@gmail.com Youtube: TexizGFX(Soon server videos)
If you leave your skype I will contact you ASAP, and If you don't have skype then get it, I no longer use MSN.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/23li4py.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/1539nxz.jpg[/img] More coming soon...
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]Current People Part of Project[/b] Texiz - Developer/Founder Runescape Sucks - Developer Wartek - Beta Tester Pvm Santa - Beta Tester the cape(wicked) - Beta Tester
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]Contest[/b] Click [url=http://www.snowe.smffy.com/index.php?topic=7.0]here[/url] for all the info and to apply.

Experience: Currently programming my own delta, but kinda want a small break, can do a lot of server sided things, and cache editing(basics) and a few other things cliented sided. if you want proof of work talk to me on skype, since I haven't made any development logs for my server.
Country(timezone purposes): United States

texiz:

Hmm it saddens me that after so many years you would think mopar members would mature. Appears not, and I have been in rsps for 4 years and it still surprises me how much people don’t have lives and can’t refrain from stupid immature comments that waste my time, and do it for a simple post count. hmm.
